text: The members of the Parliament of Fiji in 1987 consisted of members of the House of Representatives elected between 4 and 11 April 1987. However, Parliament was dissolved later in 1987 following a military coup. ==House of Representatives== {| class=wikitable !Constituency !Member !Party !Notes |- !colspan=4|Fijian Communal (12 seats)
